DOC.brief_summary: To show non-inferiority incidence rate elevate calcium-phosphorus product two treatment group : 1 ) group initial dose base baseline PTH ( baseline iPTH/80 ) 2 ) group start dose base body weight ( 0.04 mcg/kg ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Initial Dosing Parameters Zemplar Stage V Chronic Kidney Disease Subjects Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Stage V Chronic Kidney Disease Patients Hemodialysis require treatment secondary hyperparathyroidism vitamin D therapy
